When performing code review, verify the code complies with the principles defined in `/.specify/memory/constitution.md`

When performing code review, verify the code complies with everything in `/specs/{branch name}/**`. (example: `/specs/001-user-auth/plan.md`, `/specs/001-user-auth/contracts/auth-api.md`)

When performing code review, make sure code solutions are not hacky or messy work-arounds

When performing code review, make sure code is easily readable (meaningful variable and function names, no complicated ternaries, etc.)
